rooms.description: Large entrance hall with Vastu-aligned positioning to welcome positive energy.
Open-plan living area adjoining the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation.
Dining space integrated with the kitchen for family meals; designed with eco-friendly materials.
Energy-efficient kitchen with ample counter space and natural lighting from adjacent courtyard.
Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom; positioned in the north-east to align with Vastu for prosperity.
Guest or child's bedroom with east facing windows to promote positive energy and morning light.
Additional bedroom for extended family use; designed with a north-facing aspect for mental clarity.

openings.description: Large energy-efficient windows placed in the south and east to maximize daylight and cross ventilation.
Breezy, sustainable wooden doors connecting spaces while ensuring thermal comfort.

courtyard.description: Central open courtyard for passive cooling, natural ventilation, and as a recreational area; landscaped with native plants to support sustainability.

gym.description: Eco-friendly gym with sound insulation and ample natural lighting, designed for the family's fitness needs.
